entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump If you see no problem with exposing thousands of people in an indoor rally to COVID-19 and asking them to sign a waiver releasing you from responsibility if they get sick, you really shouldn’t be in the WH. Ghoulish.
